data.title: L&T Technology Services
data.meta_description: Discover career opportunities with L&T L&T Technology Services. Select the location for the department to find suitable positions available currently.
data.text:
ABOUT US

We are a global leader in Engineering and R&D (ER&D) services. With 1,343 patents filed for 57 of the Global Top 100 ER&D spenders, LTTS lives and breathes engineering and technology. At LTTS, we are passionate about creating a better and sustainable world for the future of our customers, people, and communities. Be it the World's first Autonomous Welding Robot, a Solar-Powered 'Connectivity' Drone, or be it World's Smartest Campus, we are engineering a sustainable tomorrow, one innovation at a time.

LIFE AT LTTS

At L&T Technology Services, our motto is quite simple- Empowering ideas to turn them into reality through the power of engineering. We want to create the perfect workplace for engineers and create a culture that empowers them to create the innovations of tomorrow.

Bolstered by our strong value of being purposeful, life at LTTS is all about celebrating innovation, creativity, technology, passion, and commitment. Welcome to our world!

GROWTH AT LTTS

Learning is our oxygen â€“ it is fundamental to our growth. We value the openness and curiosity to learn from anyone, anywhere.

We view honest failures as a learning opportunity. We learn from others and our challenges and successes. Through various internal growth programs, our goal is to carve out the right career growth path for all our people and empower them to innovate a better tomorrow.
